a.span: The School District of DeSoto County

img.h1: The School District of DeSoto County Home

h2.a: Welcome to The School District of DeSoto County

div.div: Welcome to our District! We believe that parent participation is key to student success; our new website is designed to provide parents with all the information they need to be active participants in their student’s education. You will find that the site works just as well on mobile devices as it does on a desktop so you can find information on the go.

section.class: content-container events1-container slick-container content-size-medium orientation-horizontal date-orientation-horizontal
content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div: Students, parents, and guardians, Quarter 3 Report Cards are now posted to each student's Skyward Portfolio. You may view Report Cards and much more at Skyward Family Access. Click the link to learn more.

h3.a: District and School Offices Closing to Walk-in Services

div.div: School District of DeSoto District and School Offices Closing to Walk-in Services beginning Tuesday, March 31, 2020
Click to view the Coronavirus Information Page which will continue to be updated as news develops.
The School District of DeSoto County

div.p: The School District of DeSoto County strives to provide a website that is accessible to all visitors. This website endeavors to comply with best practices and standards defined by Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act. DeSoto County does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, age, disability, marital status or genetic information in its educational programs, services or activities, or in its hiring or employment practices. The district also provides equal access to its facilities to the Boy Scouts and other patriotic youth groups, as required by the Boys Scout of America Equal Access Act. Questions, complaints, or requests for additional information regarding discrimination or harassment may be sent to the designated Equity Coordinator (34 C.F.R. 104.4): Dr. Gina Stafford (Equity Coordinator - Student/Parents) (gina.stafford@desotoschools.com) and Raymond Klejmont - (Equity Coordinator-Employees) (raymond.klejmont@desotoschools.com).
